keyPolicies.policyDescription: Last year 10,000 bed days were lost in local hospitals because of delays in discharge of care services. The Lib Dems will increase income tax by 1p to raise £6 billion a year for investing in the NHS and Social Care.
The UK can't thrive without a strong economy. We need free trade, with the EU and the rest of the world. We want to give a chance to new businesses, to support vibrant markets.

Private rents are too high and social housing stocks diminished. House prices are out of teach for many families starting out in life. The Lib Dems will increase housing supply, using new building technology, so everyone has access to a decent home they can afford.

Basingstoke's future depends on a highly skilled next generation. The Tories want to cut CLT funding to children's schools. Every child should have access to better education. Every teacher should want to work and provide excellent standards of education for all.

We have a responsibility to leave the next generation a world better than the one we inherited. The Lib Dems will embrace conservation and act on recycling policy. We look after the environment by embracing renewable energy and protecting our public open spaces.

issues.health: Last year 10,000 bed days were lost in local hospitals because of delays in discharge of care services. The Lib Dems will increase income tax by 1p to raise £6 billion a year for investing in the NHS and Social Care.

leaflet.personalStatement: Basingstoke is a great place, but I believe it could be better. We need to focus on the NHS and social care. Brexit is causing economic uncertainty. The Tories want to cut NHS and education funding. Voting Liberal Democrats will ensure that.

examples: Last year 10,000 bed days were lost in local hospitals.
Lib Dems will increase income tax by 1p to raise £6 billion a year for investing in the NHS and Social Care.
The UK can't thrive without a strong economy.
Basingstoke is a great place, but I believe it could be better.
We want to give a chance to new businesses.
Every child should have access to better education.
Every teacher should want to work and provide excellent standards of education for all.
We have a responsibility to leave the next generation a world better than the one we inherited.
To pay for a hard Brexit, Tories are prepared to CUT NHS spending plunging it into a further crisis.
Private rents are too high and social housing stocks diminished.
House prices are out of teach for many families starting out in life.
The Lib Dems will increase housing supply, using new building technology, so everyone has access to a decent home they can afford.
We look after the environment by embracing renewable energy and protecting our public open spaces.
Basingstoke's future depends on a highly skilled next generation.
The UK can't thrive without a strong economy.
We need free trade, with the EU and the rest of the world.
We have a responsibility to leave the next generation a world better than the one we inherited.
